publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-999 Frances Curran: Urgent Situation Regarding Asylum Seekers Hunger Strike-That the Parliament expresses its grave concern at today's developments in relation to Farouk Haidari, Farnborz Gravindk and Mokhtar Haydary, the Iranian Kurdish asylum seekers who are conducting a hunger strike, and considers that the Scottish Executive should exert every possible avenue of influence to avoid even more grave consequences for the health of all three men and to resolve the issues that have precipitated the hunger strike.

S2M-999 Frances Curran: Urgent Situation Regarding Asylum Seekers Hunger Strike-That the Parliament expresses its grave concern at today's developments in relation to Farouk Haidari, Farnborz Gravindk and Mokhtar Haydary, the Iranian Kurdish asylum seekers who are conducting a hunger strike, and considers that the Scottish Executive should exert every possible avenue of influence to avoid even more grave consequences for the health of all three men and to resolve the issues that have precipitated the hunger strike. Supported by: Carolyn Leckie*, Tommy Sheridan*, Rosie Kane*
S2M-999 Urgent Situation Regarding Asylum Seekers Hunger Strike (lodged on 4 March 2004) Ms Sandra White*
S2M-999 Urgent Situation Regarding Asylum Seekers Hunger Strike (lodged on 4 March 2004) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-999 Urgent Situation Regarding Asylum Seekers Hunger Strike (lodged on 4 March 2004) Elaine Smith*
